articles.title: Man accused of attacking TV reporter, saying ‘This is Trump’s America now’ - CNN
articles.description: A Colorado man is facing possible bias-motivated charges for allegedly attacking a television news reporter after demanding to know whether he was a citizen, saying “This is Trump’s America now,” according to court documents.
